message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $17,000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer. However, $15,000 doesn't quite cover my costs. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $16,000? This is my final offer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $15,000 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and we can move forward with the purchase.
